metadata.name: S01 Limited Edition Spinning Otaku Coin
metadata.description:
"10 Limited Edition Spinning Otaku Coins"

We believe that enthusiastic anime fans around the world are as big of a supporter of anime culture as we are. Therefore, the Otaku Coin Association has turned our logo Â© into an NFT and added a "spin" to it in 10 different colors  for anime fans to use as a symbol of how you support the anime industry and community and our mission of spreading the love of anime globally together. Each of the 10 spinning coins are uniquely colored making them a limited edition 'one-and-only' item.

* The copyright and trademark belong to the Otaku Coin Association.
* NFT owners have digital ownership and rights to post the artwork on social media. (Within the limits of the general principles of public order and morality).

About Otaku Coin
Otaku Coin is a community currency that unites people who love Japanese culture such as anime, manga, and games. Through this community currency, the Otaku Coin Association aims to help fans around the world to be able to contribute and support the growth of their favorite anime, manga, and game industry.
https://otaku-coin.com/
